title: When Your Spouse Needs Empathy
itunes:author: Guests: Greg & Erin Smalley
itunes:summary:
While you and your spouse cannot trade places, showing empathy to each other can go a long way toward strengthening your relationship. John and Greg discuss how to show empathy, even when there is tension in your relationship. Featuring Dr. Greg and Erin Smalley.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive Greg and Erin's book "Reconnected: Moving from Roommates to Soulmates in Your Marriage" for your donation of any amount:https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-03-22?refcd=1346703

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/when-your-spouse-needs-empathy/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/sharing-the-load-with-your-spouse-digital-download/?refcd=1410602

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
